channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: 15 Best Electrolyte Powders (2026): Tasty and Effective
item.description: Get those lost minerals back with the help of our top picks.

item.title: A New Bridge Links the Strange Math of Infinity to Computer Science
item.description: Descriptive set theorists study the niche mathematics of infinity. Now, they’ve shown that their problems can be rewritten in the concrete language of algorithms.

item.title: Subtle releases ear buds with its noise cancelation models
item.description: Subtle's new $199 earbuds will also let you dictate in any app on desktop or phone

item.title: ExpressVPN's road to accessible privacy — is it really possible in 2026?
item.description: 2025 was a year of structural change for the industry giant. From breaking away from its one-size-fits-all pricing model to leading the charge on post-quantum standards, here is how ExpressVPN adapted to a changing market.

item.title: USB hit the scene 30 years ago this month - we look back on its journey to standardization success
item.description: From USB 1.0 to USB-C, we’ve come a long way to reach some degree of standardization

item.title: Protein Bars: Gluten-Free, Whole Foods, Fiber (2026)
item.description: What to prioritize, what to skip, when to enjoy—plus, we’ve selected WIRED's favorite bars worth trying.

item.title: 8 WhatsApp Features to Boost Your Security and Privacy
item.description: Meta’s end-to-end encrypted messaging app is used by billions of people. Here’s how to make sure you’re one of the most locked-down ones out there.

item.title: You’ve Got a Public Reddit Profile. Here’s How to Curate It
item.description: Make your profile page look good—and make sure you’re not sharing more than you want to.

item.title: Proton VPN: 2025’s privacy milestones & the 2026 roadmap
item.description: New architecture, expanded free servers, and the race for quantum-proof privacy

item.title: I'm an AV nerd, and here's the TV and audio tech I'm most looking forward to seeing at CES 2026
item.description: Next-gen TVs, super-powered soundbars, and smart hi-fi to watch for during CES

item.title: Films gratuits, PS4 en fin de course, smartphones de 10 000 mAh, iPhone Fold imprimé en 3D – L’actu tech de la semaine
item.description: Voici un récapitulatif des actualités tech les plus marquantes de la semaine avec, au programme, des smartphones à 10 000 mAh de batterie, un tournant majeur chez PlayStation, la popularité de WikiFlix et un iPhone Fold qu'on a imprimé en 3D.
